[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1600148935838{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4918″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”left-to-right” link=”/projects/automatic-stretch-blow-molding-machines/”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1600150405083{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-right” color=”black” align=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”SEMI AUTOMATIC” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_separator color=”chino” style=”shadow”][vc_column_text]

WASHUN Machinery Mold is the professional semi-automatic blow moulding machines manufacturer, supplier and maker in China. WASHUN Machinery has rich history of manufacturing semi-automatic blow moulding machine. [More.]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1600150405083{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-left” color=”black” align=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”AUTOMATIC SERIES” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_separator color=”chino” style=”shadow”][vc_column_text]

WASHUN Machinery has decades experience for designing and manufacturing the most comprehensive two-stage reheat stretch blow moulding machines that meets the wide range of industrial needs: from small 0.1 liter bottles to large 5 gallon bottles. [More.]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”4917″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”right-to-left” link=”/projects/semi-automatic-blow-moulding-machines/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1600154691243{padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #fcfcfc !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4322″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” link=”/projects/extrusion-blow-molding-machines/”]

EXTRUSION BLOW MOLDING
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN  provides the packaging containers with volumes ranging from a few milliliters to 300 liters, large containers with capacities of up to 1,000 liters.[More.]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_single_image image=”4192″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” link=”/projects/filling-packaging-equipments/”]

FILLING & PACKAGING
[vc_column_text]

Along with the increasing requirement of PET bottle in the market, the related filling & packing equipments is getting more important.WASHUNas one of the professional injection.. [More.]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4306″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” link=”/projects/injection-molding-machine/”]

INJECTION MOLDING
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN Machinery has strongly determined the development of the Injection Moulding Machines, as a specialist company… [More.]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_single_image image=”4191″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” link=”/projects/equipments-for-caps/”]

EQUIPMENTS FOR CAPS
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN is Chinese professional cap lining machine and cap slitting machine manufacturer, supplier and maker. The lining machines is special designed for the plastic closure..  [More.]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4352″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInRight” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/products/pet-moulds/”]

PET PREFORM MOULDS
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN is the professional Chinese PET preform mould manufacturer, supplier and maker. Our PET mould department.. [More.]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_single_image image=”4201″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInRight” link=”/projects/auxiliary-equipments/”]

AUXILIARY EQUIPMENTS
[vc_column_text]

At WASHUN Machinery, the blow molding system, injection molding system, and the injection moulds are the main products. In order to provide better service for our customer.. [More.]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1608098110730{background-image: url(https://megamachinery.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/3d9253907135d4b3ff3a7396e0074e2ae1da683316231-oXtUuz.jpeg?id=3757) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

ARE HERE

WAITING”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”no-bottom-padding-row” css=”.vc_custom_1600064955994{margin-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #3498db !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1453297356032{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

DOWNLOAD A COMPLETE CATALOG OF OUR SERVICES AND PROJECTS SPECIFICATIONS
Download
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-black-tie” color=”black” align=”center”]
1 TO 1 SUPPORT
[vc_column_text]

Through one-to-one communication with each customer, our sales staff clearly grasp the needs of each customer, and provide them with specialized personalized services in a targeted manner, in order to maximize the needs of buyers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-oil-can” color=”orange” align=”center”]

EASY MAINTAIN
[vc_column_text]

 We always try to provide the most reliable PET technical solution for every customer from every corner of the world. After purchasing our products, our after-sale service relative to components, technical support, onsite service and operator training follows immediately if needed.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-globe” color=”custom” align=”center” custom_color=”#005ac1″]

SHIPPING ANYWHERE
[vc_column_text]

WASHUN Machinery’s products go to market through more than 100 countries worldwide. We have a strong after-sales service network, so no matter where you are, no matter what the problem, we can serve you in time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
